articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT MichΞllΞ
Frens new to web3-
Great read 👇🏽
Not all DAOs are pooling funds together to invest. Check out the write up explaining @developer_dao by @Web3Equity member @MichelleBakels shout out to @dabit3 for creating so much value within his community!
Michelle Bakels: Described in a tweet one single time as "famous", @developer_dao is building momentum and drawing attention... but what exactly *is* Developer DAO?
I share answers to the most frequently asked D_D questions here ⬇️
 https://michellebakels.hashnode.dev/what-is-developer-dao

Just going to remind people to nominate and tag people under this thread (yes you can nominate yourself), tomorrow is the last day, and I’ll announce the winners on Sunday.
Manny (🇺🇸 San Francisco) (🧱,🚀): Giving away 2 @developer_dao NFTs (🧱, 🚀) to join the DAO, thanks to the funds from @DAppaDanDev @web3con @Nazeeh21 and @qedk_ (give them a follow). Main criteria is just enthusiasm and decisions made by end of week. Reply to this thread with people you want to nominate.
